Name: Mountain Man
Ingredients: 10 ml Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered crystallised ginger.
Review: A peachy Whiskey Sour with a mild ginger kick.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Natasha David at Nitecap in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Mountain Man contains 234 calories
